version_description:
- Performance improvements
- "Snipers" class aim fixed
- Other corrections and improvements

- Performance improvements
- "Snipers" class aim fixed
- Other corrections and improvements

- speed up button added
- ability to concentrate all soldiers' attack on any monster getting into effective casualty radius
- fixed work on iPhone 6 Plus, iPhone 6S Plus and iPhone 7 Plus devices
- minor changes and improvements.

- speed up button added
- ability to concentrate all soldiers' attack on any monster getting into effective casualty radius
- fixed work on iPhone 6 Plus, iPhone 6S Plus and iPhone 7 Plus devices
- minor changes and improvements.

- Five new missions!
- Four new enemy types!
- Improved graphics quality and performance on devices with OpenGL ES 3.x support.
- Minor changes and improvements.

- Five new missions!
- Four new enemy types!
- Improved graphics quality and performance on devices with OpenGL ES 3.x support.
- Minor changes and improvements.

- Lots of new weapons!
- Minor changes and improvements.

- Lots of new weapons!
- Minor changes and improvements.
Minor improvements
Minor improvements
- minor changes and improvements

- new missions to complete the story.
- extra information panel for breakable objects, soldiers and monsters;
- new monsters, including the final boss;
- optional auto ammo refill and ability to hold fire for soldiers;
- secret game mode which is extremely hardcore!
- extra reward for every new wave in Survive mode;
- ability to always show soldier placement slots;
- ability to auto switch to another weapon when current weapon is out of ammo;
- many fixes and improvements.
- minor changes and improvements
